New Records: Virat Kohli's 718 runs against Australia are the most by any player against an opposition in men's T20Is
Key Match Events: Australia won by 4 wickets (with 4 balls remaining)
Pre-Game Insights: India are 90-95% settled ahead of the T20 World Cup
Australia are expected to hand a T20I cap to Tim David
Rishabh Pant has not quite been able to live up to the expectations in the T20 format
Post-Match Reflections: KL Rahul on constant criticism from outside
Aaron Finch is open to experimenting with the XI
Miscellaneous Highlights: It is expected to be partly cloudy and humid in Mohali tomorrow, with a 25% chance of precipitation in the evening
In T20s since 2018, the chasing team has won seven out of 11 matches at the ground
Finch said the wicket had 'a bit of grass on it'
